personalInfo.name: Leo Wang
personalInfo.footerDescription: Systematic documentation of projects, tools, and engineering thinking — built to be practical and reusable.

home.heroSubtitle: Documenting my projects, problem-solving journeys, and underlying reflections: turning creative visions into practical, scalable reality.
home.contactDescription: If you have any questions about my articles or wish to collaborate on research topics, feel free to reach out via email.

archive.title: The Archive.
archive.description: Documenting projects, problem-solving, and reflections along the way—together with you, turning creative visions into tangible reality.

about.subtitle: Researching projects I am genuinely passionate about, and documenting the journey of transforming curiosity into tangible, impactful results.
bioParagraphs: I am a Grade 11 AP Program student based in Shanghai. It brings me genuine joy if this blog or the projects shared here can be of any help to you.

On this platform, I dive into topics that truly captivate me, approaching each one with an engineering mindset. I focus not just on the final result, but on the entire process—from initial design and implementation to testing and final deployment.
This blog serves as both a record of my professional growth and an open engineering notebook.
Here, you'll find project documentations, tutorials, tools, and reflections—some nascent, but all authentic.
about.quote: The art of programming is the art of organizing complexity.
about.ctaDescription: I'm open to conversations, ideas, and potential collaborations that are technically interesting.
